document_data.name: The Binding
document_data.mainbody: The '''Binding''' was a sacred ritual performed daily by the faithful of [[Oghma]], the Lord of Knowledge.
document_data.Description: Oghma's devout follwers were required to perform this ritual every morning. It involved writing the symbols of Oghma while uttering a silent prayer of loyalty and praise. The symbols were written in the dirt, in ashes on a stone altar, or simply in the worshiper's mind if they were shackled or otherwise unable to physically write.
